definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: The gums bleed whenever I bite into an apple or something like that.
sentences.chinese: 每次我咬蘋果或其他類似東西時牙牀會流血。

sentences.english: I'm a good clotter. Don't worry.
sentences.chinese: 很快就不流血了，不要擔心。

sentences.english: Mom, I got bubu, I am bleeding.
But wilting is not enough: I want to bloody him.
sentences.chinese: 但是萎縮還不夠，我想讓他流血。

sentences.english: Stop any bleeding injury by applying direct pressure to the wound.
sentences.chinese: 如有流血的外傷，立即直接壓迫傷處止血。

sentences.english: Through his shedding blood for our sins.
sentences.chinese: 借著他爲我們的罪流血捨命。

sentences.english: One only knows how bloody men, even, for you to tears.
sentences.chinese: 一個是隻懂流血的男人，居然，爲你流了淚。

sentences.english: She shut her finger in the door and made it bleed.
sentences.chinese: 她的手指夾在門裏流血了。

sentences.english: The more we sweat in peace the less we bleed in war.
sentences.chinese: 和平時多努力，戰爭中少流血。

sentences.english: Effects which increase Bleed damage also increase Shred damage.
sentences.chinese: 剛又去翻了翻資料，沒說撕碎是流血傷害啊，但是。

sentences.english: In Jesus' case, he agonized so much over God's plan that he sweat drops of blood.
sentences.chinese: 在耶穌的例子裏，他爲神的計劃憂傷以致流血如汗。

sentences.english: There has to be more to it than spilling blood and slaying dragons.
sentences.chinese: 我們一定有比流血和殺怪更重要的事情。

sentences.english: The bleed effect of " Lacerate " now increases in potency with greater attack power.
sentences.chinese: 割裂的流血效果受攻擊強度的加成。

sentences.english: IT makes the hand bleed that uses it.
Many people are fulminating against the cruelty of blood sports.
sentences.chinese: 許多人憤怒地反對殘酷的流血娛樂。

definition: to bleed/bleeding/(fig.) to spend money in large amounts
to be drenched with blood/dripping blood
to be wounded/to sustain an injury
to be badly mangled or mutilated (idiom)
to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
